%%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#e8f4e8', 'primaryTextColor': '#000', 'primaryBorderColor': '#228B22', 'lineColor': '#404040', 'secondaryColor': '#f5f5f5', 'tertiaryColor': '#fff'}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> IDLE
    IDLE --> FETCH: Kick-off
    FETCH --> PARSE: Complete
    PARSE --> ARB_READ: Valid
    PARSE --> ERROR: Invalid
    ARB_READ --> READ: Grant
    READ --> ARB_WRITE: Complete
    ARB_WRITE --> WRITE: Grant
    WRITE --> CHAIN: Complete
    CHAIN --> FETCH: Next
    CHAIN --> COMPLETE: Last
    COMPLETE --> IDLE: IRQ sent
    ERROR --> IDLE: SW clear
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
